task: Create and format a new Word document
steps: 1. Open Microsoft Word from the Start menu or desktop.
2. In Microsoft Word, create a new blank document.
4. Save the document as 'draft.docx' in the desired folder.
6. Click the 'Home' tab to show the 'Styles' ribbon tab.
7. Click 'Heading 1' style to apply the style to the selected text.
